articles.content:
Everton have made a solid start to the Premier League restart, and a European place is now in sight.
Carlo Ancelotti has made no secret of his European ambitions and the Blues boss has guided Everto… [+1892 chars]

articles.author: Ashley Preece
articles.title: 'Keep talking' - Dean Smith responds to Aston Villa outcry to play two strikers - Birmingham Live
articles.description: Aston Villa v Wolves - The head coach spoke to TV journalists ahead of Villa's tricky test against Wolves at Villa Park on Saturday. Here, he discusses the notion to play two up front
articles.content:
Dean Smith has kept with his tried and trusted 4-3-3 system for Aston Villa's first three games back despite not picking up a much-needed win.
Villa's tactics have been questioned by the large major… [+2729 chars]
